header.subtitle: Share live moments at your event!
header.description:
Guests upload their moments in real time
and all that's left is to enjoy the experiences and memories

liveAlbum.title: Live Digital Album During the Event
liveAlbum.description:
From the moment the event starts, you can view the event album and project it to all guests.
The album will be accessible up to 24 hours after the event starts.
The album runs on uploaded files in random order by rounds, and resets when finished.
When new files are added, they enter directly into the current round.

downloads.title: All Album Files for Download and Memory Collection
downloads.description:
All photos and videos are stored in the system and can be downloaded at any time while the event is active.
After several days since the event start, the event will close and all event files will be deleted.
They cannot be recovered after deletion.

qrCard.title: Invitation Card with QR Leading to a Unique Page
qrCard.description:
Each event receives a unique link to the event page where guests can upload their photos and videos.
We provide a designed card with QR code, which guests can easily scan to go directly to the page and share their moments with you at the event.

howItWorks.title: So how does it actually work?
howItWorks.description:
Sign up, order and edit your event.
Within minutes your event is ready.
When the event starts, it activates automatically, allowing viewing
of the album and file uploads for guests. After 24 hours the event is considered finished but still available for personal viewing and file downloads.
After several days according to the plan, the event closes and the files are deleted.

basic.title: Basic Plan
basic.limit: Basic plan is limited to 300 files
basic.deletion: Files are deleted 14 days from event start

premium.title: Premium Plan
premium.limit: Premium plan has no file limit
premium.deletion: Files are deleted 30 days from event start
